meanings.definition: In or into the interior; within.
meanings.sent1: The cat is hiding inside the box.
meanings.sent2: She placed the book inside the bag.
meanings.sent3: The keys were inside the pocket all along!
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like a treasure chest, locked inside his mind.
meanings.sent5: The warmth inside the house was comforting on a cold day.

meanings.definition: The inner side or surface of something.
meanings.sent1: The inside of the cake was filled with cream.
meanings.sent2: He painted the inside of the room a calming blue.
meanings.sent3: The inside of the pumpkin felt slimy and cold.
meanings.sent4: Her smile brightened the inside of the room like sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The inside of the cave echoed with mysterious sounds.
